SCHED_PAGE.CONTENT_1: Stay tuned for daily program schedule and updates!
SCHED_PAGE.CONTENT_2: Here’s what we got for you today!
SCHED_PAGE.CONTENT_3: Make sure you’re at the event venue to see the daily program schedule.

CONTENT.cnt_1: The logo uses the colors of the UAE flag: red, green, white and black.
CONTENT.cnt_2: Red represents hardiness, bravery, and courage. It’s a pigment that stands for a resilient, pioneering spirit and leadership qualities. It signifies our passion to continue pursuing more years in the business to help more people realize their dreams and turn them into reality.
CONTENT.cnt_3: Green represents hope, joy, optimism and love. While it can symbolize the country’s prosperity, it also reminds us of our responsibility to Mother Nature; to love and respect our one and only home.
CONTENT.cnt_4: White represents peace and honesty. As it’s the purest colour, it is interpreted to symbolize cleanliness. Our intention is clear, and that is to fulfill our purpose, to make Earth a better place to live in for the future generation.
CONTENT.cnt_5: Black stands for the defeat of enemies, and also strength of mind. In an industry that is susceptible to a lot of negativities, it’s important to have a strong mind that deflects all these distractions.
CONTENT.cnt_6: The word “ONE” at the center is comprised of three lines representing the three facets of this year’s theme: One People. One Planet. One Purpose.
CONTENT.cnt_7: Hansief, the chosen font speaks of The V’s uniqueness. It is described as a bold sans serif typeface featuring great textures filled with unique characters.
CONTENT.cnt_8: Lastly, the figure “1” is made up of different strokes. Similar to The V’s synergy, we come from different countries, with different belief systems and backgrounds, yet we move as one towards a single purpose, which is to raise ourselves to help mankind.
CONTENT.cnt_9: In another sense, the figure “1” also evokes our innate aspiration as humans to be part of something big, and in the process of playing the role we’ve chosen to take, we always aspire to be on top, to be the best in what we do.
CONTENT.cnt_10: Overall the V-UAE 2018 logo combines the power of the country we will celebrate V-Con in, and the beauty that comes with welcoming home our dreamers on September 8-12, 2018 in Hamdan Sports Complex, Dubai, UAE.

QUESTIONS.Q1: How do I purchase a ticket?
QUESTIONS.Q7: How do I claim my wristband?
QUESTIONS.Q2: What are the available payment terms?
QUESTIONS.Q4: What would I need to prepare for visa application?
QUESTIONS.Q5: Will there be tickets for sale on the day of the event itself?
QUESTIONS.Q6: Will there be single-day event tickets available?

ANSWERS.A1: You can buy your V-UAE 2018 ticket via ticketmagic.me or at designated counters during Registration Day, 7 September 2018.
ANSWERS.A7: Please make sure that you are personally present at the registration to claim your wristband. Collection of wristbands/tickets via representation will not be entertained and is strongly discouraged. There will be no issuance of a refund, a new ticket/wristband once they have been deemed collected. You are required to purchase again in cases of loss or replacement.
ANSWERS.A2: Currently, you can pay with cash or credit card (Visa and MasterCard).

A3.A3-0: Going to V-Con? Here are 5 important things you need to bring:
A3.A3-1: During registration, bring one (1) valid ID and copy of the confirmation letter that will be sent to you via email right after the purchase of your ticket.
A3.A3-2: Enougn pocket money to last for 5 days, which you may spend on food, drinks, transportation, V-Con merchandise, souvenirs, etc. Make sure to have your money either in USD or AED.
A3.A3-3: Clothes good for 5 days. Make sure to bring extra shirts and towels as it is extra warm in Dubai, UAE around this time.
A3.A3-4: Take a camera with you to make your precious V-Con Memories last, and have something you can show to your family and future prospects when you go back home.
A3.A3-5: As you want to savour every valuable session on stage, make sure to bring your own pen and notebook for some serious note-taking!

A4.A4-1: Passport valid for at least 6 months from date of travel.
A4.A4-2: Ensure that your passport must have a minimum of 3 blank pages.
A4.A4-3: For VISA application, indicate convention visa.
A4.A4-4: All participants must have a minimum of USD 500 cash.
A4.A4-5: All participants must have the hotel booking confirmation.

ANSWERS.A5: Yes. Only transactions made thru cash and credit card will be accommodated.
ANSWERS.A6: No. The 5-day program we prepared for you is something that should be attended from Day 1 to 5 for a complete life-changing experience. It is a comprehensive, holistic event with an action-packed line-up of activities that are highly essential for you business.
